title: Notifications Update Status (request)
description: API request to update the status of one or more notifications to read, remove, received.

notifications_update_status.description: The new status for the notification(s). Allowed values: 'read', 'unread', 'remove', 'received'

ids.description: An array of IDs for the notifications to change status for.

loginid.description: [Optional] The login id of the user. If left unspecified, it defaults to the initial authorized token's login id.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
